content: Action leads to insight more often than insight leads to action
Thoughts create emotions, emotions create actions
A dream written down becomes a goal. A goal broken down into steps becomes a plan. A plan backed by actions becomes reality
Until we can receive with an open heart, we are never really giving with an open heart. When we attach judgment to receiving help, we knowingly or unknowingly attach judgment to giving help

Even when we think we're seeking pleasure, we're actually driven by the desire to free ourselves from the pain of wanting - only by understanding our pain, can we begin to control it and find better ways to deal with negative urges.

Always have a vision; be passionate; act confident even when youre not; think of it as you want it, not as it is; dont let others sway you from your point of view; see things in the present, even if they are in the future; dont give others your power
There are no failures only lessons
Money doesn't change anyone, money reveals them
Addiction is a progressive narrowing of the things that bring you pleasure
Good enough isn't good enough if it can be better, better isn't good enough if it can be best
Don't ask for an easy life, ask the strength to endure a hard one
Only thing you can control is yourself nothing else is certain
Don't count the days make the days count
People who don't value money usually overspend and under earn
It's the shots you miss that make you a champion
It's better to be wrong than to be vague
What separates the money masters from the crowd is this ability to find a winning strategy and stick with it, so the odds are always strongly in their favor
If you do what's easy you will have a hard life, if you do what's hard you will have an easy life
